name: ALT_BPA_ACT_TASK
description: This table contains the BestPractice Advisory (BPA) follow-up action of applying a task template.

columns.name: ALERT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the alert record for this row.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of this encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: BPA_FLWUP_TASK_ID
columns.description: Indicates which task templates were applied as a result of this advisory being triggered.

columns.name: BPA_FLWUP_TASK_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: This column displays the name of the task template record.

columns.name: TSKTMPLT_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description: The action taken by the task template applied from an advisory.
